casebody.data:
No. 10-7950. Charles Slaughter, Petitioner v. Grace Rogers, Administrator, Adult Diagnostic and Treatment Center, et al. 562 U.S. 1230, 131 S. Ct. 1494,

179 L. Ed. 2d 324,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1541. February 22, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Same case below, 408 Fed. Appx. 510.
